Package report

Class ReportsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • report.ReportsController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class ReportsController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This class controllers the functionality of the view reports. It's saving all the reports of the branches based on the user type (CEO or store manager).

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.net.URL location,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
        Recieving the data from the server to initialize the branches comboBox, year and reports after selecting data in the comboBox. And initialize the col in the tableview.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

      • setBranchesComboBox

        private void setBranchesComboBox()
        Setting the branches into comboBox after getting the data from the server.

      • checkUserType

        private java.lang.Object checkUserType()
        Checking the userType and initialize the reports based on the type. If the user is store manager: it will display only the reports of the stores that he manage. If the user is CEO: it will display all the reports per branch.
        Returns:
        message from the zli server after executing the querty.

      • getReportsFromDB

        private void getReportsFromDB()
        Getting the reports from the database to init the reports into the TableView after selecting branch, year and qurater.

      • setYearComboBox

        private void setYearComboBox()
        Setting the year comboBox based on the information in the database.

      • setQuraterComboBox

        private void setQuraterComboBox()
        Setting the quraterComboBoox.

      • returnHome

        void returnHome​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
        Returns to home when the user clicked on the button.
        Parameters:
        MouseEvent -

      • searchReportsButton

        void searchReportsButton​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
        After selecting branch, qurater and year, it will search the reports based on the selection. If reports are found, it will display on the tableView, else, the label "No Reports Found" will appear.
        Parameters:
        MouseEvent -

      • isInputValid

        private boolean isInputValid()
        Checking if the user selected all the comboBox so the controller will display the reports on the tableView.
        Returns:
        true or false, based on the user input.

      • getIncomeReport

        private void getIncomeReport​(Report selectedReport)
        Receiving the income information for the income report using SQL queries (using aggression functions). Setting the information after receiving the data from the server to the income report screen.
        Parameters:
        selectedReport -

      • getOrdersReport

        private void getOrdersReport​(Report selectedReport)
        Receiving the orders information for the orders report using SQL queries (using aggression functions). Setting the information after receiving the data from the server to the orders report screen.
        Parameters:
        selectedReport -

      • openSelectedReport

        private void openSelectedReport​(Report selectedReport)
        Init the Report Screen based on the report that selected. This method checks for each reports types which data to receive and which screen to display.
        Parameters:
        selectedReport -

      • getIncomeHistogramReportPerBranch

        private void getIncomeHistogramReportPerBranch​(Report selectedReport)

        Parameters:
        selectedReport -

        private void getComplaintsReportPerBranch​(Report selectedReport)

        Parameters:
        selectedReport -

      • addButtonToTableAndEvent

        private void addButtonToTableAndEvent()
        Init another col in the tableview to view the reports. If the user selected specific report, it will set the relevant data to present the report.

      • setDateRangeCurrentMonthForQuery

        private java.lang.String setDateRangeCurrentMonthForQuery​(Report selectedReport)
        Setting the date range for the SQL query of the current month to display the report of the current month.
        Parameters:
        selectedReport -
        Returns:
        dateRange String based on the current month.
